item.title: Making This Website
item.description: New Website, Yay? So, I have made a new website and uploaded it to github and i am going to be using this as a general platfrom to keep myself a little organised. Now, to fill this empty space beneath this text, lets walk through how i went about creating this beautiful masterpiece that is definitely not made using a template The previous website As you may have noticed, there was a website on this domain before this one.

item.title: Eternal's Projects
item.description: Projects C# Fractal Tree My first github upload, I had made a Tree Fractal inspired from Golang Fractal Tree Basically the same thing as the previous project, created Fractal trees, but in Golang and fyne as GUI toolkit Different Koch’s Snowflake I was trying to make Koch’s Snowflake, but something else was made, but since it was pretty, it was uploaded to github H-Tree Another Fractal, this time it was H-Tree, using Golang and fyne
